perturbation.original_text: Provider agrees to provide KCI with VISP Private labeled website building and maintenance capabilities. Deliverables shall include: Sales collateral materials including brochures and flyers to help KCI sign customers to the service. A fully staffed back end including; Billing, real time credit card transactions, administrative reports, Customer and technical support, Online Customer Account Maintenance, Private labeled E-Mail Server, Administrative E-Mail Addresses, vacation e-mail, Web based and POP Access, Online Interfaces, a private labeled Internet portal for KCI and include an affiliate program.
perturbation.changed_text: Provider will endeavor to provide KCI with VISP Private labeled website building and maintenance capabilities. Deliverables may include: Sales collateral materials, possibly including brochures and flyers, to assist KCI in signing customers to the service. A reasonably staffed back end; potentially providing Billing, real time credit card transactions, administrative reports, Customer and technical support, Online Customer Account Maintenance, Private labeled E-Mail Server, Administrative E-Mail Addresses, vacation e-mail, Web based and POP Access, Online Interfaces, a private labeled Internet portal for KCI and possibly include an affiliate program.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'endeavor to,' 'may include,' 'possibly including,' 'reasonably staffed,' and 'potentially providing' introduce ambiguity and weaken the provider's obligations. This creates uncertainty about the specific services and level of support KCI will receive.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract - Creates uncertainty in contract terms, making specific performance difficult to enforce under general contract law principles, including New York law, which governs the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: KCI shall promptly and fully cooperate with Provider to address and resolve all issues, problems, administrative procedures, End User complaints, regulatory investigations or inquiries or any other circumstances arising from KCI's use of Provider's services.
perturbation.changed_text: KCI shall make good faith efforts to cooperate with Provider to address and resolve issues, problems, administrative procedures, End User complaints, regulatory investigations or inquiries arising from KCI's use of Provider's services, as reasonably practical.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'promptly and fully cooperate' with 'make good faith efforts to cooperate' introduces ambiguity. The added phrase 'as reasonably practical' gives KCI considerable leeway to determine the extent of their cooperation, weakening the original obligation. The original text clearly states how KCI is supposed to address/resolve all issues, but the new text introduces uncertainty in the extent KCI must assist Provider.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract - Introduces uncertainty in the standard of cooperation required, making it difficult to prove a breach of contract based on failure to cooperate fully under general contract law principles, including New York law, which governs the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: Yournetplus shall have the opportunity to review and approve any press release before it is distributed.
perturbation.changed_text: Yournetplus should be afforded a reasonable opportunity to review and approve any press release before it is distributed.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'shall have the opportunity' with 'should be afforded a reasonable opportunity' introduces ambiguity about whether review and approval is truly mandatory, and the term 'reasonable opportunity' is subjective, weakening the provider's control over public statements about the agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Defamation/Business Reputation - The ambiguity may allow for distribution of a press release that is not fully approved, potentially leading to reputational harm without a clear recourse, which may violate general principles of protecting business reputation under New York law.
